        Parameters:

        Returns:
        SortableListModel of all Reports that match the search string

      • previewReport

        public java.lang.String previewReport(Report toPreview,
                             boolean format)
                               throws java.lang.Throwable
        Returns a String representation of the Report sent to Google Analytics
        Parameters:
        toPreview - The report to get preview
        format - Specifies whether to format as plain text (0) or HTML (1)
        Returns:
        String of Report results
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - Thrown if interaction between Google Analytics and the program results in an error

      • sendReport

        public boolean sendReport(Report toSend,
                 java.lang.String additionalRecipients,
                 java.lang.String subject,
                 boolean format)
                   throws java.lang.Throwable
        Sends the sepcified report to the specified recipients
        Parameters:
        toSend - The report to send
        additionalRecipients - Any extra recipients for the outgoing message, may be null or empty
        subject - The title of the outgoing message
        format - Specifies whether to format as plain text (0) or HTML (1)
        Returns:
        True if sending was successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - Thrown if there was an error when sending the email
